name: Breaking Bad: The Romance Drama: The Game (Ep. 1)
name_original: Breaking Bad: The Romance Drama: The Game (Ep. 1)
description:
MINOR SPOILERS (if you have watched through Season 4 you're good)

Welcome to Breaking Bad, the visual novel romance drama full of wacky shenanigans and fun-filled wrongdoings! Will Walter's crystal meth business ultimately fail, or will he prevail and become a millionaire extraordinaire? Find out in this episode of Breaking Bad: The Romance Drama: The Game!

Created for the Decktember game jam using Decker.
